attributes.action: Stop politicians walking away from brexit talks unless they walk out of career
attributes.background: Politician such as Boris Johnson who helped win the brexit decision should not be allowed to walk away from talks, if they do they should be force to give up politics altogether -  you wanted it - get back in that room and make it better for the British economy!

rejection.details: A decision to resign, and what to do next, is the responsibility of an individual, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
